data.author: Saternius
data.description: From the makers of the original Fapp, comes a new app of much bigger size. Synch your pebble with your Android device and get an in depth analytic of your performance.
data.title: The Fapp v2

data.author: Francisco Serradilla
data.description:
iRandom is an application to do all kind of random choices. Is has a lot of randomizing mechanisms configurable in the companion app.

Random selections can be done between numerical values or in a set of names / options.

You could launch a random choice from the middle pebble button, and see the iPhone result in the watch.
data.title: iRandom

data.author: World Champ Tech

changelog.release_notes:
What's new in this version:

1. Run+ now works over Bluetooth LE - you can now launch the app, and toggle recordings all without ever opening the companion iPhone app.
2. A fresh, revised interface for Pebble Time Round
3. Updates for the Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel Classic for Pebble 3.8.

What's new in this version:

1. Additional memory and performance improvements.

What's new in this version:

1. Memory usage improvements.

What's new in this release: 

1. Updated for Pebble Time with color maps! 
2. Improved app efficiency with 15% better battery life Pebble Time!

What's new in this release:

1. Added support for 24h time.

What's new in this version:

1. Improved reliability of connection to iPhone.
2. Added support for step cadence for iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6+.

What's new in this version: 

1. Run+ users can now get hazard alerts in the app as they run! 
2. Completely updated for version 2.5 firmware with many bug fixes and significant improvement in memory usage for better app performance.

What's new in this version: 
1. Added data screen with Pebble battery and iPhone battery levels. 
2. Added data screen with temperature, wind speed, and wind direction. 
3. Performance enhancements.
Pebble 2.1.1 initial release.

data.description:
Run+ is the only running app developed by World Champion Athletes!

Run+ integrates seamlessly with the Run + iOS App to display run time, pace, distance, altitude, grade, total climbing , and more. Users can start and stop run recordings, toggle segment timers, and view split times all from the convenience of your wrist.

latest_release.release_notes:
What's new in this version:

1. Run+ now works over Bluetooth LE - you can now launch the app, and toggle recordings all without ever opening the companion iPhone app.
2. A fresh, revised interface for Pebble Time Round
3. Updates for the Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel Classic for Pebble 3.8.

data.title: Run+

changelog.release_notes:

- Live Configuration
- Updated Storage

- Updated Font and Font Rendering

- Text Centers on Screen
The entire configuration page has been redone with many new features!

data.description:
With CustomNote, it is easy to create and save custom lines of notes directly from your phone to show up on your watch. 
 
Now, with version 4.0, notes you enter on the settings page are updated live on the watch.

The color selection on the settings page is also updated live on the watch.

Also new in 4.0 is the ability to save several supported emoji's in the note lines.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Brand New Settings Page
- Live Configuration
- Updated Storage

data.title: Custom Note Live

data.author: MotionScapes LLC

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time
minor changes, plus exit window
Phone battery indicator now shown on main screen.

IMPORTANT: you need to update/download latest version of iPhone app (1.4) for this version to work. Also, make sure you go to Settings/THIRD PARTY INTEGRATIONS, and select "Use Pebble(R) Smartwatch" Watchapp now allows you to control podcasts/music. Icon on side of lower button shows next action (play/pause/skip next). Press and hold button to fast-forward.
Works with JogPod version 1.3

data.description: Workout stats and podcast player combined via this unique iPhone App. If you enjoy listening to your favorite show/music while walking/jogging/running, this app is for you.

data.description:
The app is an unicode version of phone-remote interface. It can display unicode name of incoming call, and remote controls your phone to pick up or hang off the call. Or hang off the call and sending a SMS. 
It's only working with "Pebble Messenger".

ios.name: Pebble Run - Monitor, Track, and Log Your Runs

data.description:
Ever  feel like it's hassle every time you have to pull out your phone to see your run stats? Now with Pebble Run all that information is on your wrist.

Use your Pebble to monitor your runs, walks, jogs, hikes, bike rides, and more! Plus the app  logs all your runs so you can monitor your improvement.







Tags: GPS, Runkeeper, fitness, pumatrac, laps, timer, tracks, running, app, for
data.title: Pebble Run

data.description: Show the current name day in England, Espagna, France, Italia and Deutschland. By pressing Up move forward in days, Down backwards, Select return to the current day. Long press change the country. Affiche la fête du jour pour la France, l’Angleterre, l’Espagne, l’Italie et l’Allemagne. Up, avance la date, Down, recule, Select affiche la fête actuelle. Un appui long change le pays.

data.author: Acquasys

changelog.release_notes: First release

data.description: This app allows you to browse prices for stocks and other investments from InvestControl, the portfolio manager for Android which can be found on Google Play. You can see more data about the asset currently selected by pressing the middle button, or ask InvestControl to update prices by pressing and holding the same button for about 2 secs. The companion plugin must be installed on the phone.

latest_release.release_notes: First release

data.title: InvestControl

data.author: Xulu

changelog.release_notes: Initial release

data.description:
Prank or scare your family & friends with the Pebble SoundBoard! It features fart noises, burp noises, and scary sound effects. Just place your phone behind your victim and trigger the noises using your Pebble Smartwatch.
Please make sure that Pebble SoundBoard companion app is running and that your phone is on full volume.
Asterix (*) indicate that a sound is for PRO only, found on Google Play!

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release

data.title: Pebble SoundBoard

data.author: Acquasys

changelog.release_notes: First release.

data.description: This app is a remote control for Contrack, the personal networking tool for Android which can be found on Google Play. It allows you to check-in with your contacts by pressing the middle button, or start a phone call by pressing and holding the same button for around 2 seconds. The companion plugin must be installed on your phone.

latest_release.release_notes: First release.

data.title: Contrack

data.author: Christopher McCulloh

changelog.release_notes: First release!

data.description: A goat is hidden behind one of three doors. Select a door and the watch will open one of the two other doors (that doesn't have the goat). Now select again. Will you switch doors or keep your first choice?

latest_release.release_notes: First release!

data.title: Monty Hall Problem

data.author: Xulu

changelog.release_notes: Initial release

data.description:
Now you can make the perfect steak using the BBQ Steak Timer, choose the thickness and the way you like it  cooked and have it count down for you, informing you when to flip your steak and when your steak should be finished.

Don't know the thickness? There's a thickness scale to estimate.

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release

data.title: BBQ Steak Timer

data.author: Chris Lewis

changelog.release_notes: v4.6: update config

v4.5:
- Update server check mechanism to prepare for Dropbox Public folder visibility change.

v4.3:
- Roll back use of huge libraries, but keep new UX features.

v4.2:
- Improved UX (repeat clicks, text alignment)
- Uses pebble-events, pebble-packet
- Better retry mechanisms

v4.1:
- Minor layout bug fixed

v4.0:
- Build with SDK 4 for Diorite.
- Now shows most recently downloaded headline in the app launcher in FW 4.0.

v3.9:
- Center splash screen

v3.8:
- Layout changes to get another line or two into the title view. 
- Increase buffers to support new longer story titles.

v3.7:
- Fix issue with <![CDATA[]]> tags appearing in news items.

v3.6:
- Add News Region selection per BBC News feed availability
- Fixed truncated caching warning
- Add PayPal donation link (experimental)
- Other minor layout and code improvements

v3.5:
- Unified card design for Aplite (3.8), Basalt, and Chalk.
- Timeline pins now available for Aplite (3.8) watches.
- Minor UX bug fixes.

v3.4:
- Numerous minor UI improvements
- Coloring to extend thumbnail base color
- Moved attribution to Settings window
- Removed buggy 'pins with notifications' option.

v3.3:
- Hotfix for display bug.

v3.2:
- Polish layout and UX.
- Fix strange behaviors.
- New splash screen to match my other major apps.

v3.0:
- Added new design for Pebble Time Round.

v1.8:
- Numerous layout improvements (category view, animations, hints etc)
- Color images for Basalt users!
- Other bug fixes.

v1.7:
- Improved update reliability
- Fixed rare layout bugs

v1.6:
- Fix a couple layout & scrolling bugs
- Basalt users can now get timeline notifications when a new news story is created.

data.description:
Read the top 10 - 20 BBC News stories on your wrist. Categories available: Headlines, World, UK, Politics, Science & Environment, Technology, Health, Education, Entertainment & Arts.

Now includes regions around the world!

Category, number of stories, font size is configurable from within the app. 

Note: This app is not an official BBC News app, but a novel use of its public feeds.

latest_release.release_notes: v4.6: update config

data.title: News Headlines

data.author: DediNirtadinata

changelog.release_notes:
- Added 20, 25, and 30 minues workout time
- Added 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 minutes rest time
- Skip waiting to idle to start workout/restime. Now you can start workout/rest timer without to wait idle state.

data.description:
Maximize your workout with Workout Timer. Workout Timer helps you to calculate your workout and rest duration.

How to operate it
- Start/stop workout time, press up button
- Set workout time, press the up button for 3 seconds
- Start rest time, press down button
- Set rest time, press the down button for 3 seconds

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added 20, 25, and 30 minues workout time
- Added 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 minutes rest time

data.title: Workout Timer

data.author: Charles Rubach

changelog.release_notes:
Updated for Pebble/Steel 3.0 update
Removed the deprecated window_set_fullscreen() because now all apps are considered fullscreen by default.
Fixed a bug where I was freeing memory twice on exit causing the app to crash. Also I renamed the app.
Fixed typo in the Tic Tac Toe description: "If opponent plays a center spot you play the square clockwise to them" to "If opponent plays a center spot you play the square counter clockwise to them"
Fixed some display issues with some text and a few letters being clipped at the end of the scroll layer.

data.description: The Rogue's Ring Companion App features cryptic hieroglyphs that provide crib notes for 24+ different Scam School effects. No matter what room you're in, no matter what kind of crowd you're faced with, you'll have your cheat-sheet to perform some of the best tricks you've learned over the last 5 years of Scam School episodes. For more info on each trick visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQ5V3gGvmC4

latest_release.release_notes:
Updated for Pebble/Steel 3.0 update
Removed the deprecated window_set_fullscreen() because now all apps are considered fullscreen by default.

data.title: Rogue's Ring

data.description:
Control the lock screen of your device right from your Pebble. Set your phone or tablet's lock screen to locked, unlocked or automatic.

When set to automatic, Dislock will control the lock screen based on your Pebble's connection and will lock your device when your Pebble disconnects.

(In-app purchases for some features)

Applytics uses your Pebble to show you easily and immediately (using GA Realtime API) your most relevant screens data and event data.

Modified/fixed version of Alexsander Akers' PebbleBucks 2.0.1 app.

data.description:
This lets you pay for Starbucks using your watch. You can also view your balance and rewards information.

(This is based on the 2.0.1 version of the PebbleBucks app by Alexsander Akers. His 3.0 version is currently not working for a large group of users, so I'm putting this modified/fixed version of 2.0.1 up for people to use in the interim.)

I have fixed the balance and stars information.

I added long-press option to Top button to turn on backlight. Single-press Top button to turn light back off.

data.description:
A 21st century scavenger hunt. Find. Capture. Reward.

The Munzee Pebble app shows your Munzee score and level progress and optionally, your current Fitbit stats, refreshed every 15 minutes.

SELECT to refresh at any time.

UP to display your Social Munzees then SELECT to show a scannable QR Code.

DOWN to display a list of nearby Munzees then SELECT to view details.

data.author: SmartWeAre

changelog.release_notes: mPower Pro is a smart power strip from Ubiquiti Networks. Pebble mPower lets you control your mPower device from your wrist. Since the App controls mPower over the cloud, it requires the user to configure his/her (wireless) router IP passthrough correctly so that the mPower device's TCP port 22 can be accessed from Internet. Pebble button mapping: - Single click buttons UP or DOWN to select previous or next socket - Single click button SELECT to get current socket status - Double click button SELECT to toggle socket status (ON->OFF, OFF->ON)

data.description: mPower Pro is a smart power strip from Ubiquiti Networks. Pebble mPower lets you control your mPower device from your wrist. Since the App controls mPower over the cloud, it requires the user to configure his/her (wireless) router IP passthrough correctly so that the mPower device's TCP port 22 can be accessed from Internet.

data.author: yunshansimon

changelog.release_notes: Rebuild by PebbleSDK 2.1.1 and change the font type to bold at the frist view.
Increase speed to transmit unicode message.

1.Faster to display unicode chars on Pebble. Simply one in 1 sec ,and the full screen unicode chars within 10 sec.
2.An indicator to display the transmit progress. Let you know the app is working.
3.It will cut the long message to fit your watch's screen.
4.No control character displayed. like "LF".
5.Provied a view to send message  directly to your Pebble  to test the function.
6.Save more power.

Know issue:
1.With samsung device, when enable the accessibility service, the phone start talking. 
2.The new notification arriving when a notification is on transmission, the Pebble screen will mixed-up. I'm working on it.

data.description:
This is an application that lets you send all notifications to your Pebble smart watch with your home language's characters and emoji. Chinese, Korean, Russian, Hebrew,Japanese,etc.You can select which notification you want to display.

The application is base on Pebble Notifier (by Dattas Moonchaser) and Pebble Notifier International by (Tiago R. Espinha).

latest_release.release_notes: Rebuild by PebbleSDK 2.1.1 and change the font type to bold at the frist view.

data.title: Watch-Messenger

data.description:
Transfer a photo of a loved one from your iPhone to your Pebble, and keep it on your wrist forever. 

After the photo is transferred to your Pebble, you can view it any time you like even if you don't have your phone with you or it has run out of battery.

Please note, you can only have 1 photo stored in your Pebble at a time. This is because the Pebble has limited storage for apps to use.

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release

data.author: mgabor

changelog.release_notes: 1.7 New transfer engine, supports really long recordings
Fixed UID not showing

New in 1.5

* Fixed timer counting only every 3-4 seconds when recording with lower sample rates
* Fixed recordings being stopped too early

New in 1.4:
+ Added ability to swith between 10Hz, 25Hz, 50Hz, and 100Hz recording frequencies. (Was 100Hz, 50Hz is default)
+ Increased limit for single recordings stored in the database to 10MB, you can now record a little over 3 hours of 100Hz data, proportionally more with the new, lower recording frequencies.
+ Added menu icon

* Fixed overflowing, currupted recordings from breaking the web app. Now recording exceeding 16MB will be spliced properly without corrupting. Manually fixed previously saved corrupter entries.
Fixed Android connectivity issues.
Bug fixes
Added url to the bottom of the screen
Pretty!
Added notification with site and ID
Added online web app

data.description: Record and analyze data captured by Pebble's built in accelerometer on your PC! Data is transferred to the web app and displayed beautifully with graphs and analytic features. View your graphs at http://mgabor.hu/accel/ More polish and easier usage are coming to both the pebble client and the companion app, so keep an eye out for updates on Twitter @mgabor_hu

latest_release.release_notes: 1.7 New transfer engine, supports really long recordings

data.title: AccelTool

data.author: NeurElectrics

changelog.release_notes:
Initial release. Currently, NetSense measures both latency (time to recieve a very small response from an HTTP server) and data transfer speed (by periodically downloading a larger quantity of data). The app generates pairs of tactile pulses where the strength of the pulses depends on the speed of the most recent data transfer (stronger=faster connection), and time between pulses in each pair represents the latency (longer=more latency).

By default, latency is updated every 2 seconds and speed is updated every 2 minutes. You can change these settings in the configuration. Because speed measurement requires downloading a significant amount of data, you should make this infrequent if you are using a data-limited cellular connection.

data.description: Sensory subtitution for Pebble. NetSense translates network performance information (latency and download rate) into tactile sensations.

latest_release.release_notes:
Initial release. Currently, NetSense measures both latency (time to recieve a very small response from an HTTP server) and data transfer speed (by periodically downloading a larger quantity of data). The app generates pairs of tactile pulses where the strength of the pulses depends on the speed of the most recent data transfer (stronger=faster connection), and time between pulses in each pair represents the latency (longer=more latency).

By default, latency is updated every 2 seconds and speed is updated every 2 minutes. You can change these settings in the configuration. Because speed measurement requires downloading a significant amount of data, you should make this infrequent if you are using a data-limited cellular connection.

data.title: NetSense

data.author: Awear

changelog.release_notes: Improved options for sending SMS. You'll now be able to chain together multiple messages by selecting +.
Fixed a bug that could cause duplicate notifications

New in this release:
* Show an icon when not connected to the phone instead of pushing a "no connection" screen
* Major stability fixes for low memory conditions
* Customizable vibration patterns (customize through Android app)
* Do not disturb hours (customize through Android app)
* Multiple email accounts
Fixed a really bad bug introduced in 1.0.8 that prevented the time from updating properly.

New in this release:
- Fixed some low memory related crashes.
- Show a screen when the Awear Android app isn't available
Fixed a bug that sometimes caused a page to show up empty when paginating.
Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements.

Major improvements to performance and SMS functionality!
* Receive an SMS on the Pebble, press a button, and the SMS app launches on your phone
* When receiving an SMS you can now press a button to mark it as read
* Load times have been cut in half
* Lots of smaller bug and stability fixes
Fixed a major memory leak that would cause the app to show a error message and then get in a bad state where you had to manually restart it.

data.description:
Instant 2-way communication. Respond and mark SMS/emails/Hangout read.

★SMS
- Send and respond to SMS with a few clicks
★EMAIL
- Mark read, archive, star or delete!
- No more spam. Use gmail filters or our smart filter to remove it
★CALENDAR
- 2 clicks let people know you're running late
★WEATHER
- Daily and weekly forecasts

Use Awear as your watchface or only for communication!

latest_release.release_notes: Improved options for sending SMS. You'll now be able to chain together multiple messages by selecting +.

data.title: Awear

Fixed double-release bug that could have caused crash.

data.description:
1.1.1: fix loading settings from watch

Tracks caffeine intake and metabolism to monitor current caffeine level. Caffeine consumption is logged by configurable button presses and state is persistent across application exit. Shake or press Select button to reveal current caffeine level, date, battery, and bluetooth indicators.

Based on Modern by Łukasz Zalewski and Modern Minimal by Jway5929.

- Changed watch menu icon

data.title: Modern Caffeine

data.author: AClymer

changelog.release_notes:
Added timeout to Splash screen.
Fixed surf data fetch issue.

Pebble Time version coming soon...
It's LIVES! Tweaked some UI components and made the navigation more natural Added a Splash/Info screen

Completely Redesigned UI
- the new user interface more closely resembles Spitcast.com UI
- added Swell and Tide info
- added nifty app icon to top bar (looks cool)
- more buttons = more functions!
      Up - move north one spot
      Down - move south one spot
      Select Single Click - *new* Move forward in time 1 hour (up to 1 week !!!!!)
      Select Double Click - *new* refresh location (plus vibrate when location found)
      Select Hold (1/2 sec) - *new* refresh current spot data (does not relocate)
      Back Single Click - *new* move back in time 1 hour (to current hour)
      Back Hold (1/2 sec) - *new* exits app

Other updates to improve connection reliability and speed

There may be some bugs in this slightly incomplete version (see TODO note#1) but I wanted to get it out there because it is such an improvement from the last release.

TODO
 - completely rewrite this app (I lost all my source files for this version)
 - flick wrist to refresh (free up a button function)
 - add a map layer to show regional info like water temp, swell direction, location, etc...

Updated UI to look more like SpitCast.com
Streamlined the code in preparation for coming menus in v0.7
"Loading..." bug squished!

BETA V0.60 BIG ASS UPDATE! You now have all 300+ surf spots from SpitCast available on your wrist! 
Along with:
- Water Temps (by county)
- New Wind Icon (eh)
- Initially shows you the closest spot, and now allows you to scroll up or down the coast from there.
- SELECT now supports a double click event which will return you to the Nearest spot from anywhere in the scroll list (single click still refreshes the current spot).

data.description:
Instant access to the nearest Left Coast gnar! Get surf reports from the spots closest to you. 

**NEW UI - Completely redesigned**
Now with forecast info for up to 1 week!

UP/DOWN - Change Spot
SELECT/BACK - (Single Click) - Next/Prev hour
SELECT/BACK (Double Click) - Next/Prev Day
SELECT (Hold) - Refresh Location/Time
BACK(Hold) - Exit App

latest_release.release_notes:
Added timeout to Splash screen.
Fixed surf data fetch issue.

Pebble Time version coming soon...

data.title: SpitCast Surf Report

changelog.release_notes: fix additional issue showing iOS reconfiguration window

1. Fix iOS configuration window displace problem

2. Enhance picture download speed

1. Fix configuration window automactially close problem.
2. Show error message if camera configuration is error.
3. Fix memory leak.

Pebble button mapping:

1. Single click buttons UP or DOWN to select previous or next camera. 
2. Long press button SELECT to turn on/off IR for the current camera. 
3. Double click button SELECT to zoom in/out the current snapshot. 
4. When viewing an image larger than the Pebble screen, use buttons UP and DOWN to navigate the Pebble screen for visible area on the larger image. Use button SELECT to switch up/down or left/right operations for the buttons UP and DOWN.

data.description: Pebble Foscam lets you control and view your Foscam webcam snapshots on your wrist. The version 1.2 supports instant snapshots from multiple cameras, zooming in/out for larger than Pebble screen size images, switching IR (Infrared) on/off, etc.

data.description: Lets you quickly convert between any two currencies, easily configurable. It is designed for travel and keeps the last loaded rate so it can be used without connection to the internet, or even your phone.

changelog.release_notes: - Support for PT2
- Tweaks for AppGlance

data.description:
This app is open source! If you like my apps heart them in the appstore and consider a donation (link is at the source link of this app).

Displays your business card or any string as QR code on your watch! Simply set the string on the configuration page on the phone. The QR code is generated on your phone and sent to the watch. No companion app needed! Works without internet connection. 
- NEW: The current text for the QR code is shown directly in the launcher.
- Long-press select to hide description 
- Shake to activate background for 10 seconds

latest_release.release_notes: - Support for PT2

data.title: QR Generator

data.author: Scott Stratford

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a whole lot of bugs, mostly caused by faults in the OS! All looks ok now. Can store 100 laps, includes a simple menu of options, saves configuration and results on exit and can be re-open and continue from where you left off.

data.description: This started out as a desire to have a stopwatch I could read while swimming. Nothing out there had a font large enough to see when glanced at during a tumble turn. It has grown into something a bit more than just that. There are four display options; a) the main window, b) a large font view of the current lap, c) a watch view that includes the last two lap times & d) a list of all the lap times.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a whole lot of bugs, mostly caused by faults in the OS! All looks ok now. Can store 100 laps, includes a simple menu of options, saves configuration and results on exit and can be re-open and continue from where you left off.

data.title: Sports Timer Stopwatch

data.author: Mathew Reiss

changelog.release_notes: PTR support.
Basalt
Release 1

data.description: You're in Bluetooth range, but you just. can't. find. your Pebble? Use "Find My Pebble"! Simply keep the app in your Locker, then load it by tapping on the settings gear icon whenever you need to find your watch. The watch will vibrate and blink on and off for up to one minute while you look for it. (In order to preserve battery, the blinking and vibrations stop after one minute.)

latest_release.release_notes: PTR support.

data.title: Find My Pebble

data.description: Data forecast.io API (or openweathermap.org) Analog Screen and Detail Screens Forecast for 3 days Weather Alerts Precipitation by hour for 24 hours (bar graph) Temperature trends for 24 hours (line chart) Current Weather (Temp, Pressure change,Wind speed,Feels Like Temp, Humidity)
